entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #19983
    untriaged, Area-Linux
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web incorrectly sets LangVer to Preview for VB in Visual Studio only #19879
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Publishing standalone app (C#) fails with C++/CLI dependency #12345
    6.0.1xx
  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #16009
    untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • "Cherry pick main changes"" #19980
  • Merge pull request #19902 from wli3/cherry-pick-main-changes #19977
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19974
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19978
    Area-External
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19972
    Area-External
  • Revert "Cherry pick main changes" #19979
  • Cherry pick main changes #19902
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19958
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19976
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix flaky test for workload installer logs (#19941) #19960
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19956
    Area-External

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19824
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19969
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19968
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19967
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19886
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19885
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19808
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19807
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Avoid assuming RSG in non-C# projects #19951
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
